# `ConversationContentIntroduction` Definition

Introduction content object.

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| title | `string` | Yes | Text to show in the title. |
| subtitle | `string` | No | Text to show in the subtitle. |
| imageUrl | `string` | No | URL of an image. |
| buttonText | `string` | Yes | Text to show on the button. |
